fields.summary: CLI: iOS7.0.3 is not recognized by CLI

comments.body:
Environment - 
Titanium Studio: 3.2.0.201310280656
SDK: 3.2.0.v20131027201356
acs: 1.0.7
alloy: 1.2.2
npm: 1.3.2
titanium: 3.2.0
titanium-code-processor: 1.0.3
Xcode Version 5.0.1 (5A2053)
Mac osx 10.9 Mavericks

Result - Run the "ti info" command. Now it shows 7.0.3 iOS Simulator. See the details - 
Xcode
5.0.1 (build 5A2053) - Xcode default
  Install Location          = /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/
  iOS SDKs                  = 7.0.3
  iOS Simulators            = 6.0, 6.1, 7.0.3
  CLI Tools Installed       = no
  Supported by TiSDK 3.2.0  = yes

But also getting errors under the iOS Simulators section. See the attached log file. Hence reopening this issue.

Erros as listed:

{code}
/usr/local/lib/node_modules/titanium/node_modules/longjohn/dist/longjohn.js:181
        throw e;
              ^
TypeError: Cannot call method 'join' of undefined
    at /usr/local/lib/node_modules/titanium/lib/commands/info.js:629:61
    at Array.map (native)
    at printIos (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/titanium/lib/commands/info.js:625:30)
    at printData (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/titanium/lib/commands/info.js:400:4)
    at /usr/local/lib/node_modules/titanium/lib/commands/info.js:304:4
    at /usr/local/lib/node_modules/titanium/node_modules/async/lib/async.js:229:13
    at /usr/local/lib/node_modules/titanium/node_modules/async/lib/async.js:116:25
    at /usr/local/lib/node_modules/titanium/node_modules/async/lib/async.js:24:16
    at /usr/local/lib/node_modules/titanium/node_modules/async/lib/async.js:226:17
    at /usr/local/lib/node_modules/titanium/node_modules/async/lib/async.js:513:34
---------------------------------------------
    at Readable.on (_stream_readable.js:679:33)
    at Connection.exec (/Users/dhirendra.jha/Library/Application Support/Titanium/mobilesdk/osx/3.2.0.v20131027201356/node_modules/titanium-sdk/lib/adb.js:114:9)
    at ADB.devices (/Users/dhirendra.jha/Library/Application Support/Titanium/mobilesdk/osx/3.2.0.v20131027201356/node_modules/titanium-sdk/lib/adb.js:354:23)
    at Object.detectDevices (/Users/dhirendra.jha/Library/Application Support/Titanium/mobilesdk/osx/3.2.0.v20131027201356/android/cli/lib/detect.js:49:18)
    at /usr/local/lib/node_modules/titanium/lib/commands/info.js:259:12
    at finalize (/Users/dhirendra.jha/Library/Application Support/Titanium/mobilesdk/osx/3.2.0.v20131027201356/node_modules/titanium-sdk/lib/android.js:305:4)
    at /Users/dhirendra.jha/Library/Application Support/Titanium/mobilesdk/osx/3.2.0.v20131027201356/node_modules/titanium-sdk/lib/android.js:626:4
    at ChildProcess.<anonymous> (/Users/dhirendra.jha/Library/Application Support/Titanium/mobilesdk/osx/3.2.0.v20131027201356/node_modules/node-appc/lib/subprocess.js:58:3)
---------------------------------------------
    at run (/Users/dhirendra.jha/Library/Application Support/Titanium/mobilesdk/osx/3.2.0.v20131027201356/node_modules/node-appc/lib/subprocess.js:57:8)
    at /Users/dhirendra.jha/Library/Application Support/Titanium/mobilesdk/osx/3.2.0.v20131027201356/node_modules/titanium-sdk/lib/android.js:406:3
    at /Users/dhirendra.jha/Library/Application Support/Titanium/mobilesdk/osx/3.2.0.v20131027201356/node_modules/async/lib/async.js:530:17
    at /Users/dhirendra.jha/Library/Application Support/Titanium/mobilesdk/osx/3.2.0.v20131027201356/node_modules/async/lib/async.js:116:25
    at /Users/dhirendra.jha/Library/Application Support/Titanium/mobilesdk/osx/3.2.0.v20131027201356/node_modules/async/lib/async.js:24:16
    at /Users/dhirendra.jha/Library/Application Support/Titanium/mobilesdk/osx/3.2.0.v20131027201356/node_modules/async/lib/async.js:527:21
    at /Users/dhirendra.jha/Library/Application Support/Titanium/mobilesdk/osx/3.2.0.v20131027201356/node_modules/titanium-sdk/lib/android.js:144:7
    at /Users/dhirendra.jha/Library/Application Support/Titanium/mobilesdk/osx/3.2.0.v20131027201356/node_modules/titanium-sdk/lib/android.js:760:3
{code}
That last error was fixed in the latest 3.2.0 CI build. I tested this with 3.2.0.v20131028093244 and it works as expected.

Environment - 
Titanium Studio: 3.2.0.201310280656
SDK: 3.2.0.v20131028170320
acs: 1.0.7
alloy: 1.2.2
npm: 1.3.2
titanium: 3.2.0
titanium-code-processor: 1.0.3
Xcode Version 5.0.1 (5A2053)
Mac osx 10.9 Mavericks
Result - Verified with latest build. Now "ti info" works as expected without any error.

Closing ticket as fixed. Verified "ti info" recognizes iOS SDK 7.0.3 and iOS Simulator 7.0.3 when with Xcode 5.0.1 and the longjohn error is not being returned.

Tested on:

SDK build: 3.2.0.v20131028222444
Ti CLI: 3.2.0 (ddc8eb9a78ba9a30879eed4123af6a72577c3609)
OS: Mavericks (10.9)
Xcode: 5.0.1
